name: How Far (Highsidejr)
description:
State of the Game

Still working on the balance of the game the whole reason as to why I setting this Itch .io page up is to help get some playtesting going. :D 
The game is suppose be hard but I understand that "too hard" isn't fun but frustrating, so when you play please keep in mind that you might not succeed at first and I can assure you it can be beaten on hell difficulty.                                                                                                                What I got plan is 3 Levels that play a bit differently from each one with an endless version of them, I got 3 out of 9 playable characters ready. With sprites and animation for 3 new mobs for the upcoming second level. Also got a leaderboard going but its still in working progress as I would like a bit more in-depth and at the end I would want a boss for each level, the difficulty is always changing trying to make it feel fun and challenging. Right now my goal is to get a lot of the bugs done before I move on the second level especially bugs that are not on my end that are harder to recreate so all can enjoy my game.

A little about me, I'm a solo game dev with a passion for making games located in canada. This is my first game that I'll be uploading to the internet with that said I have made couple other projects but they never lifted off, as I've mainly stuck with programming and my biggest setback are the models, sprites and animation.  With this game I have made all the sprites and animation the only thing I can't claim that I made is the music and the sound as that was getting overly ambitious for me maybe down the line I'll revisit it but as of now there's no plan for that.  Currently I've been between  job as I went to school for Culinary management got my associate's degree and my hobbies are mainly programming and motor bikes :D other then that I don't have any huge ambitious in life.

Secret Hint*: brick + 5 = Unlocks all   

Content

Current: 

  • 1 Level
  • 1 Endless Level
  • 3 Playable characters
  • 3 Mobs
  • 1 Boss
  •  Difficulty bar (Hard, Suicide, Hell) 
  • Leader Board

Planned:

  • 3 Levels
  • 3 Endless Levels
  • 6-9 Playable Characters
  • ~9 Mobs
  • 3 Bosses
  • More In-depth leader board

Got a trello page going if you want to see what I got planned or what I have been doing.

https://trello.com/b/GWvF3h3k/how-far

If you want to talk to me or just say hello, I also got a discord.

https://discord.gg/Q5rCzrd

Controls - Keyboard
  • 'W' , 'S' , 'A' and 'D' Keys - Movement (Up, Down, Left, Right)
  • 'Left Shift' or 'Space Bar' Key - Sprint (Hold)
  • 'Left Click' - Primary fire
  • 'Right Click'  - Secondary fire
  • 'R' - Reload
  • Escape - Pause
